Our Reviews

Reyna was fantastic! With little to no input from me, she gave me one of the best haircuts I've ever had! This is where I'll be getting my haircut from now on.

Since that haircut I've had Javier, Chino, and Oscar cut my hair as well. Every time I get my hair cut at El Teca I get all kinds of compliments. It never fails!

Justin

I have been coming here for over 4 years and have never ever had a bad experience. Oscar is amazing at cutting hair and even better with curly hair.

Adrien Mendez
